name: Brick Breaker (itch) (SP4R0W)
description:
by SP4R0W

Featuring art from Kenney & music by Of Far Different Nature

Description:

Welcome to Brick Breaker - a clone of one of the most beloved games ever - Arkanoid! Move the paddle to break bricks and don't let the ball fall into the pit! A new feature is the ability to create, share and play your own levels*

Features:

- Classic Arkanoid gameplay

- Adrenaline-pumping music

- Ability to create and share your own levels!*

If you find any bugs please report in comments! Thanks!

*Saving levels on your computer and sharing is only available in the Desktop version.
